markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fancy Moves](/Feats.aspx?ID=1977) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 175 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Gladiator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=61)

**Prerequisites**
[Gladiator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1976); Expert in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

You show off your fighting style to discourage your foes. You can use [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53).
name: Fancy Moves
